attributes.action: Stop road tax until the roads are safe from potholes and damaging our vehicles
attributes.additional_details: They get the money from road tax which is not being spent on our roads that you think our safe to drive on
attributes.background: Cancel road tax until you fix the unsafe roads we drive our roadworthy vehicles on that keeps damaging our vehicles

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the condition of roads, but we're not sure what criteria you want to be set for when vehicle excise duty can be charged again.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
